item.description:
Hens being raped, dogs being raped and lizards being raped. Is humanity stooping lower with each day? OR is there a psychoanalytical explanation to this?

Animal rape cases and incidents involving animal brutality have peaked in the recent past. Sanskari Sex brings to you another episode where we talk about the un-talked. Swati, the host of Sanskari Sex, sat down with Dr Era Dutta, MD (Psychiatry, DNB (Psychiatry), MBBS, to talk about the psychology behind sexual abuse of animals. Honest, unbiased and insightful conversation about perhaps the most trivial topic.
